title: Pink Pixie Thing
body: So in game ive noticed a line of sparkly pink flying around, is it just eye candy ive never noticed or is it a teaser for the new champion? ive linked a pic of it, am i just dumb?

replies.body:
Were you in a game with a Swain player?
I think there's a bug at the moment where Beatrice flies across the map when the [Swain player turns off the ult](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/50yeef/finally_a_proof_of_the_mysterious_purple_thingy/).

Yea, can confirm, there was a swain bot in a game where I was stacking chimes as Bard in a custom for fun and I saw a raven go from my spawn to the swain player. It TECHNICALLY can be used to locate the swain in the fog of war.
ive seen it before and there were two swains in the game and thats the only time i ever saw it
its a bug when you play against a swain and that thing was beatrice
I do know that the teaser for the next champ would NOT be happening yet. We just got Kled, so the next thing to be released is going to be a rework.
That's for the next event, man. It's in the same location in the game files that every other event has occupied.
